dev_scheduledqueryrules_SOME_ORDERS_ARE_.defaultValue: SOME ORDERS ARE NOT REACHING TO ERP

dev_scheduledqueryrules_No_Payment_Event.defaultValue: No Payment Events being sent to Adyen

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_Customer_KPI_.defaultValue: Customer KPI Bukl Upload to CRM from BI

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_SOME_ORDERS_N.defaultValue: SOME ORDERS NOT REACHING TO MIRAKL FROM EPI

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_Invoice_Statu.defaultValue: Invoice Status not received from ERP to Mirakl

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_NO_PAYMEENT_N.defaultValue: NO PAYMEENT Notifications Receivied from Adyen

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_SOME_Customer.defaultValue: SOME Customers FROM ERP is not reaching to CRM

scheduledqueryrules_SOME_ORDERS_ARE_STUC.defaultValue: SOME ORDERS ARE STUCK with "DEBIT IN PROGRESS"

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_ORDERS__RETRY.defaultValue: ORDERS  RETRYING TO BE  PUSHED TO ERP CONTINOUSLY

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_SOME_ORDERS_A.defaultValue: SOME ORDERS ARE NOT GETTING PROCESSED AS EXPECTED

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_MEDIA_IMPORT_.defaultValue: MEDIA IMPORT SERVICE IS NOT RESPONDING AS EXPECTED

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_DB_connection.defaultValue: DB connection to Staging is Failing from integration

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_Service_Bus_Q.defaultValue: Service Bus Queue is not responding Fine as expected

dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_PIM_Import_Se.defaultValue: PIM Import Service is not working  Please check the Application Insight logs

properties.description: AllowAdyen
AllowMirakl
AllowCrmEpiMirakl
AllowEPI
AllowReplinishmentAPI
AllowOctopus
RDP-Sweden-Wifi-Transport
AllowSFCPortalClient
AllowRegSRFP
Allow inbound traffic from all VMs in VNET
Allow inbound traffic from azure load balancer
Deny all inbound traffic
Allow outbound traffic from all VMs to all VMs in VNET
Allow outbound traffic from all VMs to Internet
Deny all outbound traffic
[parameters('dev_ne_activityLogAlerts_Azure_Service_Health_Alert_name_integration')]
This Alert Triggers when afound Order count is equal to 0 .

source.query:
traces
| where tostring(customDimensions.["Component"]) contains "CreateOrderCommand" and tostring(customDimensions.["Details"]) contains "Order received" and tostring(customDimensions.["Component"]) contains "QueueCreateOrderCommand"
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| sort by timestamp desc

properties.description:
[concat(parameters('dev_ne_scheduledqueryrules_Customer_KPI_Bukl_Upload_to_CRM_from_BI_integration'), '. 

This alert is to verify if the customers info is reaching to CRM from BI . 
If any failure exists , kindly report to integration DEV team on the same . 
')]
This job Monitors the number of records that it gets processed during customer KPI job run .

source.query:
traces | where customDimensions.['Message'] contains "Total Crm details uploaded" | project FILENAME = extract("Blob File Name:(.*)",1,tostring(customDimensions.['ActivityId'])) ,
 TotalProcessed=extract("Total Crm details uploaded(.*)",1, tostring(customDimensions.['Message']))

properties.description:
Kindly request you to check the error mentioned below and check the call stack by which we cna get the exact service which is failing with DB connectivitiy to Staging DB . 

Kindly check the connectivity in staging DB and restart the service to have the connectivity gets estrablished.

source.query:
exceptions
|  where innermostMessage contains "The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is open" | project  details  , innermostMessage

properties.description: Kindly check the App insight logs for more view on the DHL FTP Service which is getting failed

Packing Slip status of the orders have not been received from ERP . 
All the orders in Mirakl would be with  Shipping in Progress .  Kindly check the orders which are placed two days before and see if they all are in "Shipping in Progress".  If yes then check the job "Finanace : Order Invoice( Ecom)" in ERP and see if the job has been executed in latest .

source.query: traces | where customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Mirakl updated with tracking info and shipping status" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "PackingSlipTrackingInformationMessageReceiver"

properties.description:
Kindly check the Media import service and storage queue "productimportmedia" and its corresponding deadletter messages as well . 

Issue could be due to Bad urls causing the entire service to be hung .

source.query: exceptions | where innermostType  contains "socket" and method contains "MediaImportService"

properties.description:
This alert is to check if payment notifications have been received from Adyen.

Kindly login to Adyen and check if the Server Communication is healthy at Adyen END . 

Regards,
Afound Support Desk

source.query: traces  | where customDimensions.["Component"] contains "PaymentService" and customDimensions.["Details"]  contains "Received capture notification from Adyen"

properties.description:
This alert is to check if Payment events are being sent to Adyen from Integration . 
Check the Service bus queue "Payment Events" and see if there are more messages being piled up .. 

Kindly check and restart the payment service within orders if the count is 0 for the past three alerts .  

Regards,
Afound support desk

source.query: traces  | where customDimensions.["Component"] contains "PaymentService" and customDimensions.["Details"]  contains "Sending payment information to Adyen for capture"

properties.description:
There are some orders retrying from retailorders service bus queue to ERP . 
This will cause issues with existing valid orders .  Kindly request you to have a look and update to 3rd line .

source.query: traces | where customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Sending order to ERP" | project customDimensions["OrderId"] | summarize count1=count() by tostring(customDimensions_OrderId) | project count1 , customDimensions_OrderId  | where count1>10

properties.description: PIM Import Service is not working . Please check the Application Insight logs.

source.query: traces |wheremessagecontains"Execute Time In ms: <AddEntity>b__0"ormessagecontains"Execute Time In ms: <UpdateEntity>b__0"

properties.description:
Kindly check  the outer Message and act accordingly . 
Maximum queue limit has been reached . Kindly take corrective action

source.query: exceptions | where innermostMessage contains "The maximum entity size has been reached" | project outerMessage

properties.description:
HI  , 

Kindly check the service bus queue status in portal and check in App Insights with the below log to determine the exact queue for which the issue has been occurred with

source.query:
exceptions
| where outerType contains "Microsoft.Azure.ServiceBus.ServiceBusTimeoutException" |  project innermostMessage

properties.description: This alert is to check if customers from erp notification are reaching to CRM . Count Exists in the below result

source.query:
exceptions
| where innermostMessage contains "CustomersV2 has no email"  | project innermostMessage , timestamp | summarize count() by innermostMessage

properties.description:
Kindly check the below orders . These orders are not getting proessed as expected . 
This includes (Refunds not happening , Orders getting stuck in Debit In progress and a valid case in which orders getting updated in Mirakl with auto options)

Kindly check the order in mirakl and adyen and act accrodingly . 

Regards,
Afound Support Desk

source.query:
traces | where message contains "OrderCache" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "SynchronizationService" and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Fetched order from marketplace" and customDimensions.["OrderId"] startswith "PO" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])
| join kind= leftanti (traces | where message contains "OrderCache" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "OrderProxy" and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Adding logistical order to cache" and customDimensions.["OrderId"] startswith "PO" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])) on orderid

properties.description:
This Alert is to check  if orders  are reaching to  ERP from Integration Service BUS . 

Check the Order statun in Mirakl and in ERP , if orders doesnt exists in ERP then it should be issue with the ERP service which reads the order from Service Bus and send the order to ERP . 

ERP Service is not responding fine as required .  kindly check the health of ERP service . 

Regards,
Afound Support Desk

source.query: traces | where message contains "OrderPlacement"  and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Order sent to service bus"  | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])| join kind= leftanti (traces | where message contains "OrderPlacement"  and customDimensions.["Details"] == "Order sent to ERP"  | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])) on orderid

properties.description:
There are some orders which are stuck in "DEBIT IN PROGRESS".
Kindly take necessary action on the same. 

Please find below the order details . 

Regards,
Afound Support Desk

source.query:
traces | where message contains "OrderCache" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "SynchronizationService" and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Fetched order from marketplace" and customDimensions.["OrderId"] startswith "PO" and customDimensions.["StatusCode"] contains "WaitingOnDebitPayment" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])
| join kind= leftanti (traces | where message contains "OrderCache" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "OrderProxy" and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Adding logistical order to cache" and customDimensions.["OrderId"] startswith "PO" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["OrderId"])) on orderid

properties.description:
Kindly request you to check the order list in the below result set and check the orders status in Adyen and in Mirakl . 
If the order doesnt exists in Mirakl , kindly requets you to proceed with the cancellation. 

Kindly request you to proceed with the activity with a time span of 24h from the time alert has beenn received.

If Authorization is already cancelled , kindly ignore

source.query:
traces | where message contains "PaymentService" and customDimensions.["Message"] contains "Successful: true" and customDimensions.["ActivityId"] contains "Authorization" and timestamp > now(-24h) and timestamp < now(-1h) and customDimensions.["Id"] startswith "PO"| project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["Id"]) | join kind= leftanti
(traces | where message contains "PaymentService" and customDimensions.["ActivityId"] contains "Cancel" and timestamp > now(-24h) and timestamp < now(-1h) and customDimensions.["Id"] startswith "PO" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["Id"])) on orderid | project orderid | join kind= leftanti
(traces | where message contains "OrderPlacement" and customDimensions.["Component"] contains "MarketplaceService" and timestamp > now(-24h) and timestamp < now(-1h) and customDimensions.["CommercialId"] startswith "PO" and customDimensions.["Details"] contains "Sending order to Mirakl" | project orderid=tostring(customDimensions.["CommercialId"])) on orderid
